item.description:
After a long week of clicketting-clickatting on that keyboard at work, running around and exhaution, its about time to give ourselves some relaxing exercise.

we invite you at a Bowling get together, make some new friends, meet some old ones (afterall its a meetup) and PIN some fun down.

So coming friday, at an alley near you, Indian Friends meet up group brings to you.."Lets Roll..Lets Bowl"

Venue: Sacco's Bowl Haven
45 Day Street
Somerville, MA 02144

Date: 08.07.09

Time: 9.00 pm

Price details:

Weekdays until 5:00 PM strings are $2.75 each.
After 5:00 PM and on Weekends and Holidays strings are $3.00 each

Shoe rental is $1.50/pair


"Lets Roll..Lets Bowl" would be preceded by a dinner get together. Details below

Venue: Fire and Ice
50 Church St.
Cambridge, MA 02138

Time:7.00 pm

FiRE + iCE has been nationally recognized by many restaurant publications. The Restaurant is a fun and unique experience that awakens the senses, warms the taste buds, and appeals to everyone.In an age when diners have grown accustomed to asking for meals to be specially prepared to suit individual tastes, FiRE + iCE allows guests full control in the opportunity to personally select ingredients and sauces to create the perfect meal.

SO!!! We all meet up at Fire and Ice for dinner and head toward Sacco's bowling alley after! Transportation details to follow!!
item.name: Friday Fun with Friends and Food
